name: Devil Skull
description:
Devil Skull is a fast-paced shooting game. Players will fight with a steady stream of demons in hell to get higher scores. Use your Devil Skull to kill the endless demon legion, or add 200 rounds of destructive power to it? These have nothing to do with me. In short——

Kill! ———————————————————— About this game： ————————————————————

Inspired by the FPS game and Devil Dagger in the 1990s, Devil Skull is a fast-paced retro style low polygon FPS game. Players will be in an empty island of hell. In the face of endless enemies, you can use FLAME SKULL to resist their attacks. If the situation is urgent, pick up the scattered energy crystals. They can add 200 rounds of destructive power to your weapons. Of course, don't forget to share your scores with your friends and compete!

———————————————————— Game features:

1. Face 2 terrible enemies.

2. Harvest energy crystals to increase the power of your flame skull.

3. A flame skull, which can be used for shooting or fast shooting.

4. Survive long enough to get higher scores

5. Simple and realistic scenes of hell
